refnamediv.refpurpose: Tool for placing and editing tips along the plotted curves.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: With this tool, it is possible to place, move and modify tips on the curves (polylines). This can be done by program or interactively. The commonly used mode is the interactive one:

The datatips mode can be enabled by datatipToggle() or using the Edit/Start datatip manager or clicking on the toolbar icon
of the desired graphic window.
Once enabled, a simple left click on a curve will add a tip ( a small box with information on the current point) at the interpolated point of the curve.
To move a tip, press left button on the small square mark on the curve and drag it to the desired location.
To remove a datatip, right click on the small square mark on the curve.
